description: After applying the November 14, 2023 updates, users may experience an inability to execute the curl.exe utility due to the existing versions being restricted by a newly implemented code integrity policy. This is particularly notable in systems running Windows 10 (Build Numbers: 10.0.19044.3693, 10.0.19045.3693) and Windows 11 (Build Number: 10.0.22621.2715). Relevant KB Articles include KB-5032189, KB-5032190, and KB-5032192, which provide additional context regarding the security updates that address the curl vulnerability (CVE-2023-38545).
